title: CyberTitans
description: Strategy video game developed in the auto battler genre. Each player assembles their team of Titans and choose the smartest way to manage your economy during the game, merge Titans, level up your Totem or roll the cybershop to summon up to 44 unique characters.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Unleash the Fury of the Titans in Strategic Auto Battler with Global Servers
<!--text-->
**Explore the Exciting World of CyberTitans!**

CyberTitans is the ultimate auto battler game that blends strategy, action, and dynamic gameplay. Battle players worldwide in intense 8-player matches where only the most strategic and adaptable will prevail. Combine unique Titans to create powerful synergies and dominate the ever-changing battlefield.

**GAMEPLAY**

CyberTitans is a top-tier strategy video game in the auto battler genre. Engage in thrilling 8-player online battles, each crafting their team of Titans and devising winning strategies to be the last one standing. The battlefield is an arena that consists of 64 squares (32 for each player) arranged in an 8x8 grid. With three main game modes —Free Game, Litt games and Tournaments— CyberTitans delivers endless excitement and competition.

**GAME MODES:**

Free Matches:
Jump into quick 4-player matches. The top 2 players earn rewards, making these games perfect for casual and new players.

Customization: Personalize your Titans with various avatars, totems, and reaction emotes. Showcase your style and make your mark in the CyberTitans universe.

High-Stakes Competition: Compete for big monthly prizes. Prove your skills in high-stakes tournaments and climb the global leaderboard.

Community and Social Play: Join a vibrant community of players. Share strategies, participate in discussions, and compete in live tournaments. The energy and excitement are unmatched.

**WHY CYBERTITANS?**

Immersive Auto Battler Experience: Engaging and fast-paced strategy gameplay.

Global Competitions: Challenge top players worldwide in competitive tournaments.

Regular Updates: Constantly evolving with new content, events, and updates.

Free to Play: Enjoy the core experience without spending a dime, with optional in-game purchases available.

Are you ready to unleash the fury of your Titans and become a legend in the CyberTitans universe? Download now and join the battle!

Connect with Us:

Website: www.cybertitans.io
Twitter: twitter.com/cybertitansgame
Instagram: instagram.com/cybertitansgame

LITT Matches:
Compete in 8-player matches with varying stakes of entry. The top 3 players win prizes, adding a competitive edge to each battle.

Tournaments:
Enter the competitive tournament mode with a simple bracket structure. Each game features 8 players, with the top 4 advancing to the next round. Battle through multiple rounds to reach the grand finale and claim ultimate victory.

LADDER SYSTEM:
Compete in matches to earn points and climb the global leaderboard. At the end of each season, top players receive exclusive rewards based on their rankings

**FEATURES**

Dynamic Strategy: Combine and upgrade over 40 unique Titans, each with distinct abilities and roles. Create the perfect team to dominate the battlefield.

Daily Events and Challenges: Participate in daily events and challenges to earn rewards and improve your skills. Stay engaged with regular updates and community events.
